titles.title: His banner over me is love,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
His banner over me is love,
His banner over me is love,
Safe and secure in the Rock of Ages
His banner over me is love.
Your banner over me is love,
Your banner over me is love,
I'll not fear the evil day for You are with me,
Your banner over me is love.
Your banner over me is love,
Your banner over me is love,
Safe and secure in the Rock of Ages
Your banner over me is love.
